What was r's first religious preference

Source: R/gss_vars_114.R
switch1.Rd

switch1

Source

General Social Survey https://gss.norc.org

Details

Question I'd like to go over your religious preferences since you were raised as a (RELIGION AND/OR DENOMINATION MENTIONED IN RELIG16/ DENOM16). Have you ever had another religious preference besides being (RELIGION AND/OR CHURCH DENOMINATION menTIONED IN RELIG16/DENOM16). Yes................(ASK A) No..............(GO TO MARELIG) A. Starting when you were 16 years old, what other religious preferences have you had? Please mention your earliest preference first. Any others?

  1. First Mention
